title._content: Image taken from page 270 of 'Report on the geology, mineralogy, botany, and zoology of Massachusetts, made and published by order of the government of that state'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Report on the geology, mineralogy, botany, and zoology of Massachusetts, made and published by order of the government of that state" Author: Hitchcock, Edward. Shelfmark: "British Library MAPS 7107.d.19.", "British Library HMNTS 7107.d.19." Volume: 01 Page: 270 Place of Publishing: xxu Date of Publishing: 1835 Publisher: J.S. and C. Adams Edition: 2nd ed, corrected and enlarged. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 005009643 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
